body_html:
It seems I'm late to the party but can someone explain why the state is a tuple and not just a single value? thanks.

is it the case that since the "output" of previous cell is fed in automatically to the next iteration, hence we have a cell state as-well-as an initial "output" state?

body:
It seems I'm late to the party but can someone explain why the state is a tuple and not just a single value? thanks.

is it the case that since the "output" of previous cell is fed in automatically to the next iteration, hence we have a cell state as-well-as an initial "output" state?
